articles.title: Asian stocks step back, oil bounces - 7NEWS
articles.description: Asian share markets have eased but oil has risen sharply, while commodities are on edge over the war in Ukraine.
articles.content:
Stockmarkets have taken a breather after several days of sizeable gains, while commodities were set on edge by the lack of progress in Russia-Ukraine peace negotiations.
